subject: Can you imagine that you are healthy
body:
Dear valued member.
With this letter we are presenting you one of the most popular Canadian on-line drug stores. MyCanadianPharmacy is known for providing quality products at ultra low prices. 
Canadian products are of the same quality as American but much more cheaper. So why spend more?Just make order and your products will be delivered in a safe and timely manner directly to your home. 
Click herehttp://yetplan.hk
Safety, confidentiality of your information and secure purchasing guaranteed.Spring discounts for all the customers.
Best regards,Jeri Michael
